sys_script.name: Domain - Cascade Company-Ricoh

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_9bdb9e7ddb2c4590c05f2706ca961961
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="8eba0beedb423200ddad70e21f9619df" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>core_company</collection><condition>current.sys_domain.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Domain - Cascade Company-Ricoh</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[setDomains();

function setDomains() {
   //make current transaction uncancelable while this rule runs,
   //set variable to previous cancelable state to restore when done
   var isCancelable = gs.setCannotCancel(true);
	
   setNewDomain('incident');
   setNewDomain('u_part');
   setNewDomain('u_part_info');
	
  // setNewDomain('sys_user_group');
  // setNewDomain('cmn_department');
 //  setNewDomain('cmn_location');

   //restore previous cancelable state
   gs.setCannotCancel(isCancelable);
}

function setNewDomain(table) {
   var domainID = current.sys_domain.toString();
   var rec = new GlideRecord(table);
   rec.addQuery('company', current.sys_id);
   if (rec.isValidField("managed_domain"))
      rec.addQuery("managed_domain", false);
   rec.query();
   while (rec.next()) {
      rec.sys_domain = domainID;
      rec.update();
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mohammad.Ahmed@mindshift.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-21 14:04:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>8eba0beedb423200ddad70e21f9619df</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9bdb9e7ddb2c4590c05f2706ca961961</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Domain - Cascade Company-Ricoh</sys_name><sys_overrides display_value="">ea09737fdb5cc510c05f2706ca96194e</sys_overrides><sys_package display_value="Tidel Service Portal -  Global" source="a94219c5db10091091a5560868961952">a94219c5db10091091a5560868961952</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Tidel Service Portal -  Global">a94219c5db10091091a5560868961952</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9bdb9e7ddb2c4590c05f2706ca961961</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mohammad.Ahmed@mindshift.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-21 14:04:49</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9bdb9e7ddb2c4590c05f2706ca961961"/></record_update>
